comment.body:
I agree with many things mentioned. I like the [ZeroTalk++](/1EgyL4nj9DmeSSQg3fytxGJjihxtmMon5y/) and [needed features for it](/1fznczNZUMEMvCiqSmCZGUiv5sVnRcsTD/?Topic:1549014898_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4/Features+missing+from+ZeroTalk+engine).

Related links / issues:
- [Antibot/antispam system to help prevent spam and allow community moderated sites](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/1310) (Github issue)
- [Suggestion - ZeroSite democratically managed](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/1086) (Github issue)
- [ZeroDevTalk](/142jqssVAj2iRxMACJg2dzipB5oicZYz5w)
- [ThunderWave](/thunderwave.bit) chat where some devs was/are participating
- [Kxoid](/1PEEPJuD41shof53g3WauQKi4k4wVe3Vzu/?Post/12h51ug6CcntU2aiBjhP8Ns2e5VypbWWtv/12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu/1535624559) (identity "provider" based on PeerMessage plugin)

i have not seen @geekless on ZN for some time , i think that among first tasks to be done should be http://127.0.0.1:43110/1fznczNZUMEMvCiqSmCZGUiv5sVnRcsTD/?Topic:1616711390_1CgdRv2BFaVqNfmK3qGVYDuA7EDmk8dJVS/Onion+v2+Deprecation+Sept+2021
